response.overview: When once distant UFOs become a terrifying threat and an alien invasion force begins attacking Earths major costal and riverside cities, a U.S Marine staff sergeant and his team are sent into battle only to find they must take it upon themselves to defeat an unknown enemy and protect what remains of Los Angeles.
response.title: Battle: Los Angeles

titles.title: 世界侵略：ロサンゼルス決戦
Xâm Chiếm Địa Cầu: Trận Chiến Los Angeles

results.name: Battle: Los Angeles Official Trailer #3 - (2011) HD
